task.title: Avoid usage of unmanaged code
Review non-categorized/miscellaneous findings from static code analysis

weakness.title: Validation Required DB Connection String Manipulation
Only use Open SQL in order to access the SAP database
Only use Open SQL in order to access the SAP database
Do not use a generic READ REPORT statement in custom code
Do not change the value of sy(st)-mandt
Secure both the Intent sender and receiver using permissions and do not send unencrypted private data using Intents
Investigate the methods that generate and/or permit the excessive traffic to reduce the risk that the limited resources will be exhausted under normal to high utilization periods
Application Denial of Service Connection Close
Application Denial of Service No Maximum Limit
Content analyzed and deemed not malicious (Not Malware)
Correctly encode all external input that is being written to the request
Information Leakage of Webalizer Usage Statistics
Microsoft FrontPage Server Extensions To Do List Found
Verify that the file permissions are limited to only what the authorized user should be able to do
EWS (Excite for Web Servers) Privilege Escalation
Microsoft FrontPage Server Extensions Vital Information Leakage
Improper Access To Lotus Domino Administration Databases
Perl Interpreter Scripts Arbitrary Commands Execution
Unauthorized Access To Java Servlets Source Code
Microsoft FrontPage Server Extensions Machine Name Disclosure
Web Server Access Control Files Improper Permissions Setting
User input must not be part of a file resource locator
User input must not be part of a file resource locator
User input must not be part of a file resource locator
Never feed (external) input to Function Module RFC_REMOTE_EXEC
Never feed (external) input to Function Module RFC_REMOTE_PIPE
Do not use a generic DELETE REPORT statement in custom code
iPlanet Default Installation Page Pattern Found
Macromedia Dreamweaver Remote Database Scripts Information Leakage
Oracle Single Sign-On Login Page Credential Disclosure
When an AUTHORITY-CHECK is performed, all fields that are important in the current context must be checked
When an authorization object contains the field 'ACTVT', the corresponding AUTHORITY-CHECK must not ignore this field
If a standard Function Module exists for any given authorization object that performs additional relevant tests in this context, it must be used instead of the simple/basic AUTHORITY-CHECK command
When an authorization object contains the field 'ACTVT', the corresponding AUTHORITY-CHECKs should not require '*' authorization for this field
Oracle Application Server PL/SQL Unauthorized SQL Query Execution
WS_FTP.log File Analysis Source Code Disclosure
